channel.title: 525, 508 and 602
channel.description:
hello i got some questions. i have coded 317's for over 6 months now and i think i am going to move over to 525 servers. but im wondering: do you use the same coding for 508 and 525?
thx

item.title: 525, 508 and 602
item.dc:creator: @kneistol kneistol
item.description:
@kneistol wrote:

thx

Read full topic

item.title: 525, 508 and 602
item.dc:creator: @EwfsPrince EwfsPrince
item.description:
@EwfsPrince wrote:

Well it’s still in Java… but I think I know what your trying to ask.

It’s structured very differently and you have to put code in the right files rather than just doing a text dump in client.java with the later servers, you can’t really get away with it, you might be able to; but you could end up confusing yourself or someone else if you have your code in the wrong spots. By wrong spots I don’t mean having the code in the wrong spot, I mean having a void for cooking in prayer or something even though it may still work- everything should be structured in a logical way. But apart from saying that, it’s not all that different but if your not familiar with 317’s style structure than your going to struggle. However if your familiar like you say you are you should be able to pick it up in no time.

Read full topic
